 2000-06312000-05-040,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the PUBLICATIONS SUPPLIED BY A NON-RESIDENT REGISTRANT REGULATIONS which extend their application to domestic suppliers, update the Long and Short Titles to that effect and to make reference to the Harmonized Sales Tax, update references to provisions in the Act and replace the term "audio cassette" with "audio recording".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0178 Publication Date: 2000-05-24
